title: Momentum-direction of third piece after explosion

content.question: What is the direction of the momentum of the piece having mass <math alttext="3 m" overflow="scroll"> <mn>3</mn> <mi>m</mi> </math> immediately after the explosion?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally downward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing diagonally upward and to the right.
